00179 class EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_EnvelopeGeometry : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00180 
00181 public:
00182 
00183       EGS_EnvelopeGeometry(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00184               const vector<EGS_BaseGeometry *> &geoms, const string &Name = "",
00185               bool newindexing=false);
00186 
00187       ~EGS_EnvelopeGeometry();
00188 
00189       bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00190           if( ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg ) return false;
00191           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00192           int jg, ilocal;
00193           if( new_indexing ) {
00194               jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase]; ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00195           }
00196           else {
00197               jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00198           }
00199           return geometries[jg]->isRealRegion(ilocal);
00200       };
00201 
00202       bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00203           return g->isInside(x);
00204       };
00205 
00206       int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00207           int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00208           if( ireg < 0 ) return ireg;
00209           for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00210               int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x);
00211               if( i >= 0 ) return new_indexing ? local_start[j] + i :
00212                                                  nbase + nmax*j + i;
00213           }
00214           return ireg;
00215       };
00216 
00217       int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00218 
00219       int medium(int ireg) const {
00220           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->medium(ireg);
00221           int jg, ilocal;
00222           if( new_indexing ) {
00223               jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase]; ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00224           }
00225           else {
00226               jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00227           }
00228           return geometries[jg]->medium(ilocal);
00229       };
00230 
00231       int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00232               const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00233           if( n < 1 ) return -1;
00234           int ifirst = 0; EGS_Float t, ttot = 0; EGS_Vector x(X); int imed;
00235           if( ireg < 0 ) {
00236               t = 1e30; ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00237               if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00238               isections[0].t = t; isections[0].rhof = 1;
00239               isections[0].ireg = -1; isections[0].imed = -1;
00240               ttot = t; ++ifirst; x += u*t;
00241           }
00242           else imed = medium(ireg);
00243 
00244 
00245           int j = ifirst; int ij = -1, ig;
00246           while(1) {
00247               if( ireg >= nbase ) {
00248                   if( new_indexing ) {
00249                       ig = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase];
00250                       ij = ireg - local_start[ig];
00251                   }
00252                   else {
00253                       ig = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ij = ireg - nbase - ig*nmax;
00254                   }
00255               }
00256               isections[j].imed = imed; isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00257               isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00258               if( ireg < nbase ) {// in one of the regions of the base geometry
00259                   t = 1e30;
00260                   int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00261                   ij = -1, ig;
00262                   for(int i=0; i<n_in; i++) {
00263                       int ireg_i = geometries[i]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,&imed);
00264                       if( ireg_i >= 0 ) {
00265                           ij = ireg_i; ig = i;
00266                       }
00267                   }
00268                   ttot += t; isections[j++].t = ttot;
00269                   if( ij < 0 ) ireg = ibase;
00270                   else ireg = new_indexing ? local_start[ig] + ij :
00271                                              nbase + ig*nmax + ij;
00272                   if( ireg < 0 ) return j;
00273                   if( j >= n ) return -1;
00274                   x += u*t;
00275               }
00276               else {
00277                   int iadd = new_indexing ? local_start[ig] : nbase + ig*nmax;
00278                   int nsec = geometries[ig]->computeIntersections(ij,n-j,
00279                           x,u,&isections[j]);
00280                   int nm = nsec >= 0 ? nsec+j : n;
00281                   for(int i=j; i<nm; i++) {
00282                       isections[i].ireg += iadd;
00283                       isections[i].t += ttot;
00284                   }
00285                   if( nsec < 0 ) return nsec;
00286                   j += nsec;
00287                   if( j >= n ) return -1;
00288                   t = isections[j-1].t - ttot;
00289                   x += u*t; ttot = isections[j-1].t;
00290                   ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00291                   if( ireg < 0 ) return j;
00292                   imed = g->medium(ireg);
00293               }
00294           }
00295           return -1;
00296       }
00297 
00298       EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00299                       const EGS_Vector &u) {
00300           if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00301           EGS_Float d;
00302           if( ireg < nbase ) d = g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
00303           else if( g->regions() == 1 ) d = g->howfarToOutside(0,x,u);
00304           else {
00305               int ir = g->isWhere(x);
00306               d = g->howfarToOutside(ir,x,u);
00307           }
00308           return d;
00309       };
00310 
00311       int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00312                  EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00313           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00314               // inside.
00315               if( ireg < nbase ) {
00316                   // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00317                   // check if we hit a boundary in the base geometry.
00318                   // if we do, newmed and normal get set accordingly.
00319                   int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00320                   int ij = -1, jg;
00321                   // check if we will enter any of the inscribed geometries
00322                   // before entering a new region in the base geometry.
00323                   for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00324                       int ireg_j =
00325                           geometries[j]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00326                       if( ireg_j >= 0 ) {
00327                           // we do. remember the inscribed geometry index
00328                           // and local region
00329                           ij = ireg_j; jg = j;
00330                       }
00331                   }
00332                   if( ij < 0 ) return ibase;
00333                     // ij<0 implies that we have not hit any of the
00334                     // inscribed geometries => return the base geometry index.
00335                     // ij>=0 implies that we entered inscribed geometry
00336                     // jg in its local region ij.
00337                   return new_indexing ? local_start[jg] + ij :
00338                                         nbase + jg*nmax + ij;
00339               }
00340               // if here, we are in an inscribed geometry.
00341               // calculate its index (jg) and its local region (ilocal).
00342               int jg, ilocal;
00343               if( new_indexing ) {
00344                   jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase]; ilocal = ireg-local_start[jg];
00345               }
00346               else {
00347                   jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00348               }
00349               // and then check if we will hit a boundary in this geometry.
00350               int inew = geometries[jg]->howfar(ilocal,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00351               if( inew >= 0 ) return new_indexing ? local_start[jg] + inew :
00352                                                     nbase + jg*nmax + inew;
00353                 // inew >= 0 implies that we either stay in the same
00354                 // region (inew=ilocal) or we entered a new region
00355                 // (inew!=ilocal), which is still inside the inscribed geometry
00356                 // inew<0 implies that we have exited the inscribed geometry
00357                 // => check to see in which base geometry region we are.
00358               inew = g->isWhere(x+u*t);
00359               if( inew >= 0 && newmed ) *newmed = g->medium(inew);
00360               return inew;
00361           }
00362           // if here, we are outside the base geometry.
00363           // check to see if we will enter.
00364           int ienter = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00365           if( ienter >= 0 ) {
00366               // yes, we do. see if we are already inside of one of the
00367               // inscribed geometries.
00368               for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00369                   int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x+u*t);
00370                   if( i >= 0 ) {
00371                       // yes, we are.
00372                       if( newmed ) *newmed = geometries[j]->medium(i);
00373                       return new_indexing ? local_start[j] + i :
00374                                             nbase + nmax*j + i;
00375                   }
00376               }
00377           }
00378           return ienter;
00379       };
00380 
00381       EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00382           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00383               EGS_Float tmin;
00384               if( ireg < nbase ) { // in one of the regions of the base geom.
00385                   tmin = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00386                   for(int j=0; j<n_in; j++) {
00387                       EGS_Float tj = geometries[j]->hownear(-1,x);
00388                       if( tj < tmin ) {
00389                           tmin = tj;
00390                           if( tmin <= 0 ) return tmin;
00391                       }
00392                   }
00393                   return tmin;
00394               }
00395               int jg, ilocal;
00396               if( new_indexing ) {
00397                   jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase]; ilocal = ireg-local_start[jg];
00398               }
00399               else {
00400                   jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00401               }
00402               return geometries[jg]->hownear(ilocal,x);
00403           }
00404           return g->hownear(ireg,x);
00405       };
00406 
00407       int getMaxStep() const {
00408           int nstep = g->getMaxStep();
00409           for(int j=0; j<n_in; ++j) nstep += geometries[j]->getMaxStep();
00410           return nstep+n_in;
00411       };
00412 
00413       bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00414           if( ireg >= 0 && ireg < nreg ) {
00415               if( ireg < nbase ) return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00416               int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00417               return geometries[jg]->hasBooleanProperty(ilocal,prop);
00418           }
00419           return false;
00420       };
00421       void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType) {
00422           setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00423       };
00424       void addBooleanProperty(int) {
00425           setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00426       };
00427       void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType,int,int,int step=1) {
00428           setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00429       };
00430       void addBooleanProperty(int,int,int,int step=1) {
00431           setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00432       };
00433 
00434       const string &getType() const { return type; };
00435 
00436       void printInfo() const;
00437 
00438       void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00439       void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00440       EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00441           if( ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg ) return 1;
00442           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00443           int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00444           return geometries[jg]->getRelativeRho(ireg - nbase - jg*nmax);
00445       };
00446 
00447       virtual void getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00448 
00449 
00450 protected:
00451 
00452       EGS_BaseGeometry *g;           
00453       EGS_BaseGeometry **geometries; 
00454       int              n_in;         
00455       int              nbase,   
00456                        nmax;    
00458       static string    type;    
00459 
00460       bool new_indexing;        
00461       int* reg_to_inscr;        
00462       int* local_start;         
00463 
00470       void setMedia(EGS_Input *,int,const int *);
00471 
00472 private:
00473 
00474       void setPropertyError(const char *funcname) {
00475           egsFatal("EGS_EnvelopeGeometry::%s: don't use this method\n  Define "
00476                   "properties in the constituent geometries instead\n",
00477                   funcname);
00478       };

00480 };

00493 class EGS_ENVELOPEG_EXPORT EGS_FastEnvelope : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00494 
00495 public:
00496 
00497       EGS_FastEnvelope(EGS_BaseGeometry *G,
00498               const vector<EnvelopeAux *> &fgeoms, const string &Name = "",
00499               int newindexing=false);
00500 
00501       ~EGS_FastEnvelope();
00502 
00503       bool isRealRegion(int ireg) const {
00504           if( ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg ) return false;
00505           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->isRealRegion(ireg);
00506           int jg, ilocal;
00507           if( new_indexing ) {
00508               jg = reg_to_inscr[ireg-nbase]; ilocal = ireg - local_start[jg];
00509           }
00510           else {
00511               jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00512           }
00513           return geometries[jg]->isRealRegion(ilocal);
00514       };
00515 
00516       bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00517           return g->isInside(x);
00518       };
00519 
00520       int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00521           int ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00522           if( ireg < 0 || n_start[ireg] < 0 ) return ireg;
00523           for(int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00524               int j = glist[jj];
00525               int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x);
00526               if( i >= 0 ) return nbase + nmax*j + i;
00527           }
00528           return ireg;
00529       };
00530 
00531       int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00532 
00533       int medium(int ireg) const {
00534           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->medium(ireg);
00535           int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00536           return geometries[jg]->medium(ilocal);
00537       };
00538 
00539       int computeIntersections(int ireg, int n, const EGS_Vector &X,
00540               const EGS_Vector &u, EGS_GeometryIntersections *isections) {
00541           if( n < 1 ) return -1;
00542           int ifirst = 0; EGS_Float t, ttot = 0; EGS_Vector x(X); int imed;
00543           //egsInformation("computeIntersections: ireg=%d x=(%g,%g,%g) "
00544           //     "u=(%g,%g,%g)\n",ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z,u.x,u.y,u.z);
00545           if( ireg < 0 ) {
00546               t = 1e30; ireg = howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00547               if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00548               isections[0].t = t; isections[0].rhof = 1;
00549               isections[0].ireg = -1; isections[0].imed = -1;
00550               ttot = t; ++ifirst; x += u*t;
00551               //egsInformation("entered after t=%g in ireg=%d at x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00552               //        t,ireg,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00553           }
00554           else imed = medium(ireg);
00555 
00556 
00557           int j = ifirst; int ij = -1, ig;
00558           while(1) {
00559               //egsInformation("in loop: j=%d ireg=%d imed=%d x=(%g,%g,%g)\n",
00560               //        j,ireg,imed,x.x,x.y,x.z);
00561               if( ireg >= nbase ) {
00562                   ig = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; ij = ireg - nbase - ig*nmax;
00563               }
00564               isections[j].imed = imed; isections[j].ireg = ireg;
00565               isections[j].rhof = getRelativeRho(ireg);
00566               if( ireg < nbase ) {// in one of the regions of the base geometry
00567                   t = 1e30;
00568                   int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,&imed);
00569                   //egsInformation("In base geometry: t=%g inew=%d\n",t,ibase);
00570                   ij = -1, ig;
00571                   for(int ii=n_start[ireg]; ii<n_start[ireg+1]; ii++) {
00572                       int i = glist[ii];
00573                       int ireg_i = geometries[i]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,&imed);
00574                       if( ireg_i >= 0 ) {
00575                           ij = ireg_i; ig = i;
00576                       }
00577                   }
00578                   ttot += t; isections[j++].t = ttot;
00579                   //egsInformation("after inscribed loop: t=%g ij=%d ig=%d"
00580                   //      " ttot=%g\n",t,ij,ig,ttot);
00581                   if( ij < 0 ) ireg = ibase;
00582                   else ireg = nbase + ig*nmax + ij;
00583                   if( ireg < 0 ) return j;
00584                   if( j >= n ) return -1;
00585                   x += u*t;
00586               }
00587               else {
00588                   int iadd = nbase + ig*nmax;
00589                   int nsec = geometries[ig]->computeIntersections(ij,n-j,
00590                           x,u,&isections[j]);
00591                   //egsInformation("In inscribed %d: got %d intersections\n",ig,
00592                   //        nsec);
00593                   int nm = nsec >= 0 ? nsec+j : n;
00594                   for(int i=j; i<nm; i++) {
00595                       isections[i].ireg += iadd;
00596                       isections[i].t += ttot;
00597                   }
00598                   //egsInformation("last intersection: %g\n",isections[nm-1].t);
00599                   if( nsec < 0 ) return nsec;
00600                   j += nsec;
00601                   if( j >= n ) return -1;
00602                   t = isections[j-1].t - ttot;
00603                   x += u*t; ttot = isections[j-1].t;
00604                   ireg = g->isWhere(x);
00605                   //egsInformation("new region: %d\n",ireg);
00606                   if( ireg < 0 ) return j;
00607                   imed = g->medium(ireg);
00608               }
00609           }
00610           return -1;
00611       }
00612 
00613       EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00614                       const EGS_Vector &u) {
00615           if( ireg < 0 ) return 0;
00616           EGS_Float d;
00617           if( ireg < nbase ) d = g->howfarToOutside(ireg,x,u);
00618           else if( g->regions() == 1 ) d = g->howfarToOutside(0,x,u);
00619           else {
00620               int ir = g->isWhere(x);
00621               d = g->howfarToOutside(ir,x,u);
00622           }
00623           return d;
00624       };
00625 
00626       int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00627                  EGS_Float &t, int *newmed = 0, EGS_Vector *normal = 0) {
00628           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00629               // inside.
00630               if( ireg < nbase ) {
00631                   // in one of the regions of the base geometry
00632                   // check if we hit a boundary in the base geometry.
00633                   // if we do, newmed and normal get set accordingly.
00634                   int ibase = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00635                   int ij = -1, jg;
00636                   // check if we will enter any of the inscribed geometries
00637                   // before entering a new region in the base geometry.
00638                   for(int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00639                       int j = glist[jj];
00640                       int ireg_j =
00641                           geometries[j]->howfar(-1,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00642                       if( ireg_j >= 0 ) {
00643                           // we do. remember the inscribed geometry index
00644                           // and local region
00645                           ij = ireg_j; jg = j;
00646                       }
00647                   }
00648                   if( ij < 0 ) return ibase;
00649                     // ij<0 implies that we have not hit any of the
00650                     // inscribed geometries => return the base geometry index.
00651                     // ij>=0 implies that we entered inscribed geometry
00652                     // jg in its local region ij.
00653                   return nbase + jg*nmax + ij;
00654               }
00655               // if here, we are in an inscribed geometry.
00656               // calculate its index (jg) and its local region (ilocal).
00657               int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00658               // and then check if we will hit a boundary in this geometry.
00659               int inew = geometries[jg]->howfar(ilocal,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00660               if( inew >= 0 ) return nbase + jg*nmax + inew;
00661                 // inew >= 0 implies that we either stay in the same
00662                 // region (inew=ilocal) or we entered a new region
00663                 // (inew!=ilocal), which is still inside the inscribed geometry
00664                 // inew<0 implies that we have exited the inscribed geometry
00665                 // => check to see in which base geometry region we are.
00666               inew = g->isWhere(x+u*t);
00667               if( inew >= 0 && newmed ) *newmed = g->medium(inew);
00668               return inew;
00669           }
00670           // if here, we are outside the base geometry.
00671           // check to see if we will enter.
00672           int ienter = g->howfar(ireg,x,u,t,newmed,normal);
00673           if( ienter >= 0 ) {
00674               // yes, we do. see if we are already inside of one of the
00675               // inscribed geometries.
00676               //if( n_start[ienter] < 0 ) return ienter;
00677               for(int jj=n_start[ienter]; jj<n_start[ienter+1]; jj++) {
00678                   int j = glist[jj];
00679                   int i = geometries[j]->isWhere(x+u*t);
00680                   if( i >= 0 ) {
00681                       // yes, we are.
00682                       if( newmed ) *newmed = geometries[j]->medium(i);
00683                       return nbase + nmax*j + i;
00684                   }
00685               }
00686           }
00687           return ienter;
00688       };
00689 
00690       EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00691           if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00692               EGS_Float tmin;
00693               if( ireg < nbase ) { // in one of the regions of the base geom.
00694                   tmin = g->hownear(ireg,x);
00695                   if( tmin <= 0 ) return tmin;
00696                   for(int jj=n_start[ireg]; jj<n_start[ireg+1]; jj++) {
00697                       int j = glist[jj];
00698                       EGS_Float tj = geometries[j]->hownear(-1,x);
00699                       if( tj < tmin ) {
00700                           tmin = tj;
00701                           if( tmin <= 0 ) return tmin;
00702                       }
00703                   }
00704                   return tmin;
00705               }
00706               int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00707               return geometries[jg]->hownear(ilocal,x);
00708           }
00709           return g->hownear(ireg,x);
00710       };
00711 
00712       bool hasBooleanProperty(int ireg, EGS_BPType prop) const {
00713           if( ireg >= 0 && ireg < nreg ) {
00714               if( ireg < nbase ) return g->hasBooleanProperty(ireg,prop);
00715               int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax; int ilocal = ireg - nbase - jg*nmax;
00716               return geometries[jg]->hasBooleanProperty(ilocal,prop);
00717           }
00718           return false;
00719       };
00720       void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType) {
00721           setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00722       };
00723       void addBooleanProperty(int) {
00724           setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00725       };
00726       void setBooleanProperty(EGS_BPType,int,int,int step=1) {
00727           setPropertyError("setBooleanProperty()");
00728       };
00729       void addBooleanProperty(int,int,int,int step=1) {
00730           setPropertyError("addBooleanProperty()");
00731       };
00732 
00733       int getMaxStep() const {
00734           int nstep = g->getMaxStep();
00735           for(int j=0; j<n_in; ++j) nstep += geometries[j]->getMaxStep();
00736           return nstep+n_in;
00737       };
00738 
00739       const string &getType() const { return type; };
00740 
00741       void printInfo() const;
00742 
00743       void setRelativeRho(int start, int end, EGS_Float rho);
00744       void setRelativeRho(EGS_Input *);
00745       EGS_Float getRelativeRho(int ireg) const {
00746           if( ireg < 0 || ireg >= nreg ) return 1;
00747           if( ireg < nbase ) return g->getRelativeRho(ireg);
00748           int jg = (ireg - nbase)/nmax;
00749           return geometries[jg]->getRelativeRho(ireg - nbase - jg*nmax);
00750       };
00751 
00752       virtual void getLabelRegions (const string &str, vector<int> &regs);
00753 
00754 
00755 protected:
00756 
00757       EGS_BaseGeometry *g;           
00758       EGS_BaseGeometry **geometries; 
00759       int              n_in;         
00760       int              nbase,   
00761                        nmax;    
00763       int              *glist;
00764       int              *n_start;
00765       static string    type;    
00766 
00767       bool new_indexing;        
00768       int* reg_to_inscr;        
00769       int* local_start;         
00770 
00777       void setMedia(EGS_Input *,int,const int *);

00781       void setPropertyError(const char *funcname) {
00782           egsFatal("EGS_FastEnvelope::%s: don't use this method\n  Define "
00783                   "properties in the constituent geometries instead\n",
00784                   funcname);
00785       };
